About.paragraph: I'm Iuri. 25 years old, born in South Brazil, living in Germany for the past 4 years. In the last 3.5 years I've been working at a robotics start-up here in Ingolstadt. For a bit of a life shake-up and for a more exciting work environment, I'm currently looking for a new job opportunity in the USA!
Why2: Teamwork taken to the next level
